Description: Will be InCharge of our dispatch system, create a landing page for clients.integrate landing page with the Dispatch system.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or relevant work experience).
Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
Proficiency in front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern front-end frameworks.
Strong knowledge of back-end programming languages and frameworks, such as Node.js, Python, Ruby on Rails, Java, or PHP.
Experience with database management and querying languages (e.g., SQL, NoSQL).
Familiarity with version control systems, especially Git.
Knowledge of RESTful API design and development.
Understanding of web application architecture and design patterns.
Ability to work in an Agile development environment.
